title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part apply to providers certified and/or, funded or otherwise
authorized by the Office that: (1)
provide
gambling treatment as a secondary diagnosis to a substance use disorder; or
(2)
have received a waiver to
provide gambling-only treatment services prior to the effective date of this
regulation; or
(3)
have received a
"designation" pursuant to the provisions of this Part to provide gambling only
treatment services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
857.3

Adopted

New

York State Register March 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
